revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (6), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (6)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS O!Play Air HDP-R3.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = ASUS O!Play HD Media Player |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.asus.com/Home-Entertainment/OPlay_HDPR1/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_O!Play_HDP-R1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = O!Play |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = HDP-R1 (R3) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = media player, media streamer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-OPLAYHDPR1, TLZ-NU103 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTD1073;RTD1073DD; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400 <!-- 400 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;HY27UF081G2A; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU64M16DG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, eSATA |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.3, Audio out, SPDIF, Remote |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/02/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B002OQPBVQ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B003B9V1N2 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-NU103 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188SU; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :''HD Media Player, Media Streamer''
*ASUS O!Play HDP-R1 (Wi-Fi - [https://3dnews.ru/digital/asus_oplay_hdpr3 R3]°) {{See also|ASUS O!Play Air HDP-R3|ASUS}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Realtek]] RTD1073DD (DTS) @400 MHz *Flash: ''SK hynix'' HY27UF081G2A (256MB) *RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5TU64M16DG-AC (128MB) *WLAN: [[AzureWave AW-NU103]] [[Realtek]] ([https://3dnews.ru/590937/page-2.html R3]°) *Card Reader: [[Alcor Micro]] AU6476
===Overview=== *The Easiest Way to Enjoy HD Content in the Living Room. *Enjoy music with one-click music shuffle shortcut key. *Rich online entertainment services. *Most popular media formats supported. *Stunning 1080p high definition visuals. *Fast content transfer with eSATA and LAN.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.hwp.ru/articles/Obzor_setevogo_Full_HD_pleera_ASUS_O_21Play_HDP_R1_81101/ ''ASUS O!Play HDP-R1'' Review on '''HWP'''] (RU) *[https://3dnews.ru/581074/page-2.html ''ASUS O!Play HDP-R1'' on '''3Dnews'''] (PCB images)
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.moservices.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=14&t=924 ''Asus O!Play HDP-R1'' on '''MoServices''' forums] :• [http://www.moservices.org/forum/download/file.php?id=6840 PCB HDP-R3 top] • [http://www.moservices.org/forum/download/file.php?id=6841 PCB HDP-R3 bottom] :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTD1073DD @400MHz :Flash: ''SK hynix'' HY27UF082G2B (256MB) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5TU64M16DG-AC (128MB) :Audio: ''Cirrus Logic'' CS4352CZZ (DAC) :USB: ''Genesys Logic'' GL850G (4-port Hub) :PMIC: [[TI]] uP7704U8 (+3.3V), LM78L05M (+5V)
==See also== *[[ASUS Nexus Player (TV500I)]] • [https://www.asus.com/us/Home-Entertainment/Nexus_Player/ PPage] *ASUS O!Play HDP-R1 ([https://3dnews.ru/digital/asus_oplay_hdpr3 R3]) • [https://www.asus.com/Home-Entertainment/OPlay_HDPR1/ PPage] *[[ASUS O!Play Air HDP-R3]] • [https://3dnews.ru/590937/page-2.html Review] (PCB images) *[[ASUS O!Play HD2]] • [https://gadgetcat.wordpress.com/2011/06/25/lg-bd550-blu-ray-disc-player/ Review] • [https://3dnews.ru/602301 Review] (PCB images) :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTD1073DD (DTS) :Flash: SK hynix H27U4G8T2BTR (512MB) :RAM: Winbond W971GG6JB-18 (128MB) :WLAN: [[ASUS WL-6203]] ([[Realtek]]) :Card Reader: [[Alcor Micro]] AU6476 *[[ASUS O!Play Mini]] • [https://3dnews.ru/digital/ASUS-O-Play-MINI Review] (PCB images) :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTD1055DD (DTS) :Flash: Macronix MX25L12845EMI-10G (16MB) :RAM: SK hynix HY5PS1G1631CFP-25 (128MB) :Card Reader: [[Realtek]] RTS5159; PSU: 12V/2A *[[ASUS O!Play Mini V2]] • [https://www.asus.com/Home-Entertainment/OPlay_Mini_V2/ PPage] *[[ASUS O!Play TV Pro]] • [https://www.asus.com/Home-Entertainment/OPlay_TV_Pro/ PPage] • [https://3dnews.ru/626805 Review] (PCB images) :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTD1086DD (DTS) @750MHz :Flash: ''SK hynix'' H27UAG8T2BTR (2GB) :RAM: 2x ''Micron'' MT41J128M16HA-15E (512MB) :WLAN: [[AzureWave AW-NE139H]] ([[Realtek]]) :Card Reader: [[Alcor Micro]] AU6433 :USB 3.0 Hub: ''ASMedia'' ASM1051E :DVB-T Tuner: MxL MXL101SF *[[ASUS WiCast (EW2000)]] • [https://3dnews.ru/610286 Review] (PCB images) - B0042JST4E :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-EW2000RX MSQ-EW2000RX] (2010-07-12) - [[Foxconn]] :WLAN: ''AMIMON'' [http://www.amimon.com/medial-market/ AMN2120] (WHDI, 5.2~5.8 GHz) :HDMI: ''ITE'' CAT6023CQ (HDMI 1.3a) - (CAT6613CQ FCC) *[[D-Link Boxee Box]] • [http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Boxee-Box-Teardown/4109/1 Teardown] :WLAN: [[AzureWave AW-NU109H]] ([[Broadcom]]) *[[Sony NSZ-GS7]] • [https://www.sony.com/electronics/support/home-video-other-home-video-products/nsz-gs7 SPage] *[[VIZIO VAP430]] • [https://www.vizio.com/costar.html PPage]
